scripts.install:all: npm install && cd quizmaster-api && npm install && cd ../quizmaster-ui && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd quizmaster-api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:ui
scripts.start: concurrently --names "API,UI" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd quizmaster-api && npm run start:prod" "cd quizmaster-ui && npm run start"
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:api && npm run test:ui
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:ui && npm run test:api:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:api:cov && npm run test:ui:coverage
